member.name: M:DiscUtils.PowerShell.Utilities.NormalizePath(System.String)
member.remarks: PowerShell has a bug that prevents tab-completion if the paths contain ':' characters, so in the external path for this provider we encode ':' as '#'.

member.name: M:DiscUtils.PowerShell.Utilities.DenormalizePath(System.String)
member.remarks: PowerShell has a bug that prevents tab-completion if the paths contain ':' characters, so in the external path for this provider we encode ':' as '#'.
